content.json:
## CEF standard custom label functionality has limitations and to solve those, here are the field mappings done for CyberArk data connector. Refer to the table below for further context.

|      Old Label     |       Sentinel Label      |    xsl KeyName   |
|:------------------:|:-------------------------:|:----------------:|
| Safe Name          | DestinationUserPrivileges | dpriv            |
| Device Type        | FileType                  | fileType         |
| Affected User Name | SourceUserPrivileges      | spriv            |
| Database           | DeviceExternalID          | deviceExternalId |
| Other info         | destinationProcessName    | dproc            |
| Request Id         | FileID                    | fileId           |
| Ticket Id          | OldFileID                 | oldFileId        |
The workbooks outlined here are simply examples to get you started. Your enterprise's security view will dictate what fields need to be depicted in your workbooks and Sentinel's ease of use allows for dynamic views of your Vault activity.

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Cyber-Ark" 
| where DeviceProduct == "Vault" 
| where OldFileID contains "Error" or OldFileID contains "Failure"| summarize AggregatedValue = count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)| sort by TimeGenerated desc| render timechart
content.title: Errors within the last hour
content.noDataMessage: There have been no reported errors in the last hour

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Cyber-Ark" 
| where DeviceProduct == "Vault" 
| search OldFileID contains "error" or OldFileID contains "Failure"| summarize AggregatedValue = count() by DestinationUserName
content.title: CPM errors, by account

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Cyber-Ark" 
| where DeviceProduct == "Vault" 
| where DeviceEventClassID == 7| where SourceUserName contains "administrator"| distinct SourceHostName, DeviceAddress, TimeGenerated | summarize count() by SourceHostName, DeviceAddress, TimeGenerated | render timechart
content.title: Logins by the Administrator account
content.noDataMessage: There have been no logins by the Adminstrator account

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Cyber-Ark" 
| where DeviceProduct == "Vault" 
| where DeviceEventClassID == 300| summarize count() by DestinationHostName
content.title: Endpoints most connected to
content.noDataMessage: The PSM is not being utilized

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Cyber-Ark" 
| where DeviceProduct == "Vault" 
| where DeviceEventClassID in (295,428)| where DestinationUserPrivileges !contains "PSMSessions"| where DestinationUserPrivileges !contains "PVWAConfig"| where DestinationUserPrivileges !contains "PasswordManagerShared"| where DestinationUserPrivileges !contains "VaultInternal"| where DestinationUserPrivileges !contains "PasswordManager"| where DestinationUserPrivileges !contains "PVWAPrivateUserPrefs"| where DestinationUserPrivileges !contains "ConjurSync"| where DestinationUserPrivileges !contains "SharedAuth_Internal"| where DestinationUserPrivileges !contains "PSM"| where SourceUserName !contains "PasswordManager"| summarize count() by DestinationUserPrivileges| render barchart
content.title: Accounts most accessed
content.noDataMessage: There have been no retrievals of accounts from the Vault

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Cyber-Ark" 
| where DeviceProduct == "Vault" 
| where DeviceEventClassID in (22,24,31,414,416,418)| summarize count() by DestinationUserName| render piechart
content.title: Successful CPM operations
content.noDataMessage: It appears that there is no management of credentials

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Cyber-Ark" 
| where DeviceProduct == "Vault" 
| where DeviceAction contains "disable"| summarize count() by FileName, DestinationUserName, OldFileID

CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Cyber-Ark" 
| where DeviceProduct == "Vault" 
| where DeviceEventClassID in (295,428)| where DestinationUserPrivileges !contains "PSMSessions"| where DestinationUserPrivileges !contains "PVWAConfig"| where DestinationUserPrivileges !contains "PasswordManagerShared"| where DestinationUserPrivileges !contains "VaultInternal"| where DestinationUserPrivileges !contains "PasswordManager"| where DestinationUserPrivileges !contains "PVWAPrivateUserPrefs"| where DestinationUserPrivileges !contains "ConjurSync"| where DestinationUserPrivileges !contains "SharedAuth_Internal"| where DestinationUserPrivileges !contains "PSM"| where SourceUserName !contains "PasswordManager"| summarize count() by SourceUserName, TimeGenerated
content.title: Account objects accessed by user
content.noDataMessage: It appears no accounts have been accessed

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Cyber-Ark" 
| where DeviceProduct == "Vault" 
| where DeviceEventClassID in (302,359,360,361,412,411)
| summarize audit=makeset(AdditionalExtensions) by coalesce(column_ifexists("ExtID", ""),tostring(ExternalID)), DestinationUserName, SourceUserName
content.title: General audit information
content.noDataMessage: There just isn't anything to show here

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Cyber-Ark" 
| where DeviceProduct == "Vault" 
| where DeviceEventClassID in (295,428)| where DestinationUserPrivileges contains "ConjurSync"| where SourceUserName contains "Sync_components"| summarize AggregatedValue = count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)| sort by TimeGenerated desc| render timechart
content.title: Conjur Vault syncs
content.noDataMessage: It doesn't look like you have Conjur
